column4: I'm on 32bit etch and firefox is sucking really badly for me. Am I doing something wrong or does firefox just suck?
you ahve your browser open for more than 12 hours at a time?
yes, it is open weeks at time
I know, but the phpmysql configs have no effect on my logout duration checkout line 37 and 36 in the config: http://pastie.org/1312224
you may have to restart the service after editing the config
see if sudo /etc/init.d/phpmyadmin restart or something similiar
I restarted apache still not effect
you need to reload phpmyadmin I think that is running as a service also.
phpmyadmin is a php app, its running as a apache vhost
